results.title: Metformin as a new anti-cancer drug in adrenocortical carcinoma
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ interferes with the proliferative autocrine loop of @GENE_IGF2 @GENE_3481 @@@IGF2@@@/@GENE_IGF1R @GENE_16001 @@@IGF-1R@@@, which supports @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000310 @@@adrenal cancer@@@ growth.

citations.NLM: Poli G, Cantini G, Armignacco R, Fucci R, Santi R, Canu L, Nesi G, Mannelli M, Luconi M. Metformin as a new anti-cancer drug in adrenocortical carcinoma Oncotarget. 2016 Aug 2;7(31):49636-49648. PMID: 27391065
citations.BibTeX: @article{27391065, title={Metformin as a new anti-cancer drug in adrenocortical carcinoma}, author={Poli G and Cantini G and Armignacco R and Fucci R and Santi R and Canu L and Nesi G and Mannelli M and Luconi M}, journal={Oncotarget}, volume={7}, number={31}, pages={49636-49648}}

results.title: Efficacy of Metformin in the Treatment of Acne in Women with Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome: A Newer Approach to Acne Therapy.
results.text_hl: Introduction: @DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@Acne vulgaris@@@ is a chronic @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ disorder of the pilosebaceous units and has been associated with @DISEASE_Hyperandrogenism @DISEASE_MESH:D017588 @@@hyperandrogenism@@@, which, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@, is most commonly caused by @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment can correct ovarian and functional @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000310 @@@adrenal@@@ @DISEASE_Hyperandrogenism @DISEASE_MESH:D017588 @@@hyperandrogenism@@@ in adolescents with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

citations.NLM: Sharma S, Mathur DK, Paliwal V, Bhargava P. Efficacy of Metformin in the Treatment of Acne in Women with Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome: A Newer Approach to Acne Therapy. J Clin Aesthet Dermatol. 2019 May;12(5):34-38. PMID: 31320975
